page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SOPHIE
page.content: "I get up at 7o'clock,turn on my bedside light and read for a bit.Then I get dressed and mum does my hair.I go downstairs and have Frosties for breakfast.We walk to school or go by car if we're late.Outside we wait till the bell rings then go in and take out our workshop cards. After maths we have playtime at 10.30.We go outside to play on the field or yard. Some of us eat fruit or nuts. On Tuesdays we see Look and Read on television. At lunch time we wash our hands and walk to the canteen for school meals or packed lunches with milk or water to drink.The oldest on the table wipes it down.Afterwards I play with all my friends it is the longest play time. In the afternoon we do all kinds of things.I like sewing best.We take our chairs and sometimes our knitting to the story corner.We go home at 3.15."
